tags.name: time-ticker
tags.description: A non-visible custom element that fires an event periodically.

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: Items to rotate through.  Sets repeat to length.

attributes.name: repeat
attributes.description: Number of times to repeat before setting counter back to 0.  Setting Items will set this automatically.

attributes.name: loop
attributes.description: Indicates whether should cycle or stop.
